replies.body:
{{champion:58}} *Yawn* How long was I asleep? 

{{champion:75}} Well you fell asleep on Thursday and today is Monday so a few days. 

{{champion:58}} NASUS!? So that wasn't a dream. 

{{champion:75}} No. And I am truly sorry about never visiting you while you were sealed up. But I have to know, what was the worst part about being trapped in there? 

{{champion:58}} *shuddering* If you must know...the worst part about it was....


***Flashback***

{{champion:101}} **Knock Knock**
 
{{champion:58}} .....

{{champion:101}} **Knock Knock**

{{champion:58}} Grrr...

{{champion:101}} **Come on Renekton. Knock Knock**

{{champion:58}} sigh...who's there?

{{champion:101}} **Not Nasus**

{{champion:58}} AGH!!!!!!

***End Flashback***

{{champion:58}} He said that joke every day...for 1000 years...AND I COULDN'T KILL HIM!!!! Even now it eats away at my sanity. 

{{champion:75}} Renekton!!!

{{champion:58}} Brother!!! Leave now..my anger is returning. Please leave before I attack. 

{{champion:75}} I promise you Brother. I will save you. No matter how long it takes, I will not abandon you again. *runs*


{{champion:58}} Thank you...Brother....
This is beautiful.....the feels. Still Better than the Fault in Our Stars
Is that the new Twilight?

Pretty much. The relationship has pretty much the same dynamic, but instead of there being a vampire, the two people involved have cancer. Somehow, it doesn't make anyone care any more. Probably based on the poor writing of the screenplay, which was based on the poor writing of the book.
Still a better love story than Fifty Shades of Grey.
That one shouldn't even count as a love story.
Make love story?

Love story?
More like porn stuff
Ok? Ok.
Xerath is a jerk.
{{champion:268}} Indeed.
Thumbs up for the joke.
{{champion:101}} **Oh I got other jokes. Knock Knock.**
{{champion:58}}  sigh...who's there?

{{champion:101}} **Not Ao Shin. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA**


{{champion:59}} HEY!! What did you say about my son?

{{champion:101}} **Oh Crap!!! ** *Runs away*

{{champion:59}} Get back here!!!
I laughed so hard!!!
:D

still a better love story than twilight.......sorry I had to XD
